Author: OakleyCruz
EnhancedContent: Every time I unlock the desktop icon, the text becomes bold. Although it does not affect usage, it is unpleasant to look at. If I disable the animation effect, it returns to normal. Is there any other way to make it work properly?
Title: After unlocking Windows 11, the icon text becomes bold.
Description: Every time I unlock the desktop icon, the text becomes bold. Although it does not affect usage, it is unpleasant to look at. If I disable the animation effect, it returns to normal. Is there any other way to make it work properly?
